table.caption: Favorite Methods to Destroy Documents
rows: Any way you like, provided you make a copy first
The bottomless hole in the basement—at least you're pretty sure it's bottomless
Feeding it to the goat out back
Making your coworkers eat it by slipping it into their food, piece by piece—it's the only way to be sure
table.name: Documancer; Favorite Methods to Destroy Documents
